description.title: About Ikigai Self-Discovery Cards
description.paragraph1: Are you ready to discover your life's purpose? Our card set, filled with 35 thoughtful prompts, are designed to guide you on a journey towards a deeper understanding of your passion, mission, vocation, and profession.
description.paragraph2: Inspired by the Japanese concept of Ikigai, these cards offer a daily dose of mindfulness and personal growth. Ikigai is what allows you to look forward to the future even if you're miserable right now - it might just help you live a more fulfilling life.
description.paragraph3: This is not a game of speed or competition. We invite you to look at these cards as a cycle of challenges that requires you to dive deep into yourself, start new habits and change your way of thinking.

heart.title: üíñ The Heart
heart.description: This chapter will help you define the things that excite, interest & enliven you and without which you couldn't imagine your life.

lungs.title: ü´Å The Lungs
lungs.description: Chapter lungs is about finding your place in the world. The tasks will lead you to the realization of your true potential and encourage you to experiment and explore more.

hands.title: üëê The Hands
hands.description: This chapter is about development, evolvement and growth. The tasks will encourage you to move forward in self-improvement and help understand the missing links for successful transformation.

mind.title: üß† The Mind
mind.description: The chapter mind is about making you aware of your talents and skills. The tasks will help you understand what you want to do in your life and what talents you wish to acquire.

soul.title: ‚ú® The Soul
soul.description: This chapter is about finding your true self. The tasks will be a small push towards self-awareness and authentic living.
